rukus.text: allaha ta'ala kahi cukyo che ke be pujyo na banavo, pujya to phakata te ekalo ja che, basa! Tame sau maro ja dara rakho
akaso ane dharati para je kami pana che, badhum tenum ja che ane teni ja bandagi yogya che, sum to pana tame tena sivaya bijathi daro cho
tamari pase jetali pana ne'amato che badhum tene ja apelum che, hajum pana tamara para ko'i musibata avi jaya to teni ja samaksa phariyada karo cho
ane jyam tene te musibata tamara parathi dura kari didhi, tamara manthi ketalaka loko potana palanahara sathe bhagidara theravava lage che
ke amari apeli ne'amatono abhara na mane, sarum to thodoka phayado uthavi lo, chevate tamane khabara padi ja jase
ane jene janata pana nathi teno bhaga amari apeli roji'o manthi nakki karo cho, te allaha tamara a aropa vise jarura savala karase
ane te pavitra allaha mate balaki'o nakki kare che ane potana mate te je potani iccha anusara hoya
temana manthi ko'ine jyare balakini khabara apavamam ave to teno cahero phikko padi jaya che ane manamam sankoca anubhave che
a kharaba vatana karane lokothi chupa'ine phare che, vicare che ke sum tene apamanita tha'i, la'ine phare, athava tene matimam dabavi de, oha! Ketalo kharaba nirnaya kare che
akherata para imana na lavanaranum ja kharaba udaharana che, allaha mate to ghana ja ucca guno che te ghano vijayi ane hikamatavalo che
